query: SELECT c.id, c.pin, c.name, c.email, COUNT(a.id) as total_activations FROM customers c LEFT JOIN activations a ON c.id = a.userId WHERE c.balance = 0 GROUP BY c.id LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT c.id, c.pin, c.name, c.email, COUNT(a.id) as total_activations FROM customers c LEFT JOIN activations a ON c.id = a.userId WHERE c.balance = 0 GROUP BY c.id LIMIT 5
